email_body: [IMAGE] [IMAGE] What prize would you prefer to win, Phillip? It's time to pick a prize! Want chances to win a big screen TV? How about $25,000 CASH? Tell up to 30 friends about iWon and you could win the prize of your choice. Click here to enter now, Phillip. Good luck and have fun, -- The iWon Team Forgot your member name? It is: PALLEN70 Forgot your iWon password? Click here. You received this email because when you registered at iWon you agreed to receive email from us. To unsubscribe from one or more email categories, please click below. Please note, changes may take up to one week to process. If you're not signed in, you will need to do so before you can update your profile. Click here.
